results.message: Check that the title element describes the document.
results.selector: html > head > title

results.message: Ensure that the img element's alt text serves the same purpose and presents the same information as the image.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(1) > img

results.message: If this image cannot be fully described in a short text alternative, ensure a long text alternative is also available, such as in the body text or through a link.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(1) > img

results.message: This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1

results.message: This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1 > span

results.message: If this element contains a navigation section, it is recommended that it be marked up as a list.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2)

results.message: Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1)

results.message: Img element is marked so that it is ignored by Assistive Technology.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > section > div > img

results.message: If this image cannot be fully described in a short text alternative, ensure a long text alternative is also available, such as in the body text or through a link.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > section > div > img

results.message: This element is absolutely positioned and the background color can not be determined. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the background are at least 7:1.
results.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > section > div > p

results.message: This element is absolutely positioned and the background color can not be determined. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the background are at least 7:1.

results.message: Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.

results.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.27:1. Recommendation: change text colour to #008181.
